languages.text: Этого человека терзает тяжелая, но излечимая болезнь — на ранней стадии хватило бы одной ампулы лекарства.

traits.locale_text: Этого человека терзает тяжелая, но излечимая болезнь — на ранней стадии хватило бы одной ампулы лекарства.

languages.text: This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.
languages.original_text: Этого человека терзает тяжелая, но излечимая болезнь — на ранней стадии хватило бы одной ампулы лекарства.

traits.locale_text: This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.
This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.
This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.
This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.
This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.

languages.text: 这名男子患的病症非常严重，但并非无药可医。若是在病情爆发的早期阶段及时干预，只要一小瓶药剂，就可以挽救他的性命。
languages.original_text: This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.

traits.locale_text: 这名男子患的病症非常严重，但并非无药可医。若是在病情爆发的早期阶段及时干预，只要一小瓶药剂，就可以挽救他的性命。

languages.text: Este hombre padece una enfermedad grave, pero curable: un frasco de medicina administrada en las primeras etapas debería haberle salvado.
languages.original_text: This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.

traits.locale_text: Este hombre padece una enfermedad grave, pero curable: un frasco de medicina administrada en las primeras etapas debería haberle salvado.

languages.text: この男性は、重篤だが治る可能性のある病気にかかっている。初期段階で薬を1本投与すれば、彼は助かっただろう。
languages.original_text: This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.

traits.locale_text: この男性は、重篤だが治る可能性のある病気にかかっている。初期段階で薬を1本投与すれば、彼は助かっただろう。

languages.text: Dieser Mann leidet unter einer ernsten, aber heilbaren Krankheit. Wäre ihm im Anfangsstadium ein Medikament verabreicht worden, wäre er zu retten gewesen.
languages.original_text: This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Mann leidet unter einer ernsten, aber heilbaren Krankheit. Wäre ihm im Anfangsstadium ein Medikament verabreicht worden, wäre er zu retten gewesen.

languages.text: Cet homme souffre d'une maladie grave et néanmoins curable : une simple fiole de médicament administrée dès les premiers symptômes aurait suffi à le sauver.
languages.original_text: This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.

traits.locale_text: Cet homme souffre d'une maladie grave et néanmoins curable : une simple fiole de médicament administrée dès les premiers symptômes aurait suffi à le sauver.

languages.text: Bu adam, ciddi ama tedavi edilebilir bir hastalıkla pençeleşiyor. Hastalığın ilk aşamalarında verilecek bir şişe ilaçla kurtulabilirmiş.
languages.original_text: This man is suffering from a severe but curable disease — one vial of medicine administered in the early stages would have saved him.
